.`` In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Larry Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' the collapse of such a dictatorship was`` inevitable'' in Egypt, as well as in other countries throughout the world.`` What comes next, it's hard to predict,'' Patrick Leahy said. A huge part of( Egypt's) natural product is tourism. They've got to get tourists feeling free to go back. Nobody's about to book a trip to Egypt right now.`` The United States really needs stability there, Patrick Leahy continued,`` because of our interests in Israel and Jordan and elsewhere.'' Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy.
